modName: Syndelle - Wood Elf Trainer Archer Follower
summary: Syndelle is a wood elf trainer/archer who is also member of the cannibal faction with her own loot system.  She is available in CBBE & SeveNBase body types with Optimized & Uncompressed skin options.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff7700][size=6][b]Syndelle[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/79oi86d1j/syndelletitleimage.png[/img]

[font=Verdana][color=#ff7700][size=4]To Find Out More About The Green Pact & Wood Elves Please Check Out These Videos

[youtube]sDcNci3WEHM[/youtube][youtube]2mR5oTTdiCE[/youtube]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/xhul0fqtj/info.png[/img]
[/size][/color]Name:  Syndelle
Race:  Custom Wood Elf
Voice:  Female Even Toned
Marriageable:  Yes
Faction:  Cannibal
Trainer:  Master Marksman
Height:  1.04
Weight:  50
Body Options:  Base CBBE & SeveNBase
Skin:  Fair Skin (Optimized & Uncompressed)
Armor:  Pretty Ranger (Upgradeable)
Weapon:  Arrowsong (Upgradeable)
Location:  Shrine of Peryite

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4tmoubuyv/ShrineOfPeryite(Location).jpg[/img]

Class:  Master Marksman Trainer
Combat Style:  Custom
Sandbox/Idle:  Custom
Custom Loot System

Levels with player.  Wood Elf Traits/Bonuses.
Main Skills/Bonuses:  Archery, Light Armor, Sneak
Spells:  Healing, Flames, Custom Ice Spike

Tested with EFF & EFT
ENBs:   RealVision & Vividian

Name Credit Goes To Feolainn
Testers/Screenshots:  sfeile, DragonStar99, & Feolainn

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/497nrn1qf/QA.png[/img]
Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  What is the other armor pictured in some screenshots?
A:  Linkle Outfit

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  My apologies, I no longer release personal presets.

Q:  SSE Conversion?
A:  When time allows & if permissions allow.

Q:  Console Port?
A:  No immediate plans due to console restrictions.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.
